title: John Zorn - Rituals (FLAC)
description:
Owls, Windmachines, Gravedigging and Ritual Magick, ZornÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s strange and mystical monodrama for mezzo soprano and ten instruments is presented here in a beautiful new studio recording. Composed for the Bayreuth Opera Festival in 1998, the Rituals premiere was a bit of a scandal, with the audience split down the middleÃ¢â‚¬Â¦half outraged detractors, stomping out, whistling and jeering and half cheering supporters. Performed here by a stellar group of Zorn regulars and some very special guests, Rituals is opera at its virtuosic and intimate best. Five movements of magic and alchemy from the crucible of an uncompromising and unpredictable musical maverick. (Copied from Tzadik website)


Enjoy, and please support the artist
